doc.description:
Airspeed ETS (I2C). Driver for the EagleTree Systems Airspeed Sensor. Has only been tested with V3 of the sensor hardware.
Notes: Connect directly to TWOG/Tiny/Lisa I2C port. Multiple sensors can be chained together. Sensor may be in the proprietary mode (default) or in 3rd-party mode. In 3rd-party mode you must define AIRSPEED_ETS_3RD_PARTY_MODE. A eLogger is needed to set sensor to 3rd-party mode, which is supposed to be more reliable than the default mode.
Sensor module wire assignments: - Red wire: 5V - White wire: Ground - Yellow wire: SDA - Brown wire: SCL

define.name: AIRSPEED_ETS_OFFSET
define.description: sensor reading offset for sensor in proprietary mode (default: 0)

define.name: AIRSPEED_ETS_SCALE
define.description: sensor scale factor for sensor in proprietary mode (default: 1.8)

define.name: AIRSPEED_ETS_START_DELAY
define.description: set initial start delay in seconds

define.name: AIRSPEED_ETS_SYNC_SEND
define.description: flag to transmit the data as it is acquired

define.name: AIRSPEED_ETS_3RD_PARTY_MODE
define.description: read raw value for sensor in third-party mode
